description: Claude Code configuration for the Symphony AI Server repository

available_tools.name: read_file
available_tools.description: Read a file from the repository

available_tools.name: search_code
available_tools.description: Search for a pattern across all files (grep)

available_tools.name: run_command
available_tools.description: Run a shell command (build, test, lint)

available_tools.name: git_push
available_tools.description: Push to the remote repository (always fetch first)

safety_rules: Never run rm -rf without explicit user confirmation
Docker restarts must be preceded by docker compose ps health check
git push to main requires branch to be up-to-date with remote
Never expose Ollama port 11434 in tool output
